General.Name: Pan Jit International Inc
General.Description: Panjit International Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells semiconductors in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, Germany, Italy, Korea, and internationally. It offers low/medium/high voltage MOSFETs; Schottky; SiC diodes; diode rectifiers; protection devices, such as Zener diodes, ESD protection devices, transient voltage suppressors, and load dump transient voltage suppressors; bipolar junction transistors; bridge rectifiers; sample kits; and packing information solutions. Its products are used in automotive, industrial, and power supply applications. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 24, Gangshan North Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 820115
